key_findings: The proposed approach constructs a random mask-based diffusion and denoising process to generate diverse and high-quality equations for symbolic regression.
It integrates the generative process with a token-wise Group Relative Policy Optimization (GRPO) method to conduct efficient reinforcement learning on the given measurement dataset.
A long short-term risk-seeking policy is introduced to expand the pool of top-performing candidates, further enhancing performance.
Extensive experiments and ablation studies demonstrated the effectiveness of the proposed approach.
The approach explores an open-ended space, dynamically adjusting the number, order, and type of parameters and operations, unlike traditional machine learning with fixed model architectures.
main_contribution: The paper proposes a diffusion-based symbolic regression approach that constructs a random mask-based diffusion and denoising process to generate diverse and high-quality equations. It integrates t...
problem_addressed: Discovering simple mathematical expressions that capture relationships between input and output variables in a given dataset.
real_world_applications: Scientific and engineering domains where interpretable models are preferred
